name: The Sun in High Dignity
description:
I will tell this to you now so that you know what I did, and why I had to do it, and why I had ought to be forgiven; even if you cannot find it in yourself to forgive me: someday, at some future time, you may.

A Twine game about horror on the seas, doomed lesbians, magic, lies, murder, and absolution. Written for My First Game Jam 2K18 (Winter Edition). View fullscreen!
